description: This Java class `UsersController` is a REST controller handling user-related API endpoints, including listing users with pagination and filtering, and retrieving a user by ID.

classes.name: UsersController
classes.description: REST controller for user management, providing endpoints for listing users and fetching user details.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list users with optional filtering by username, pagination, and sorting.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve details of a specific user by ID.
